# Publius

> Publius is your AI-powered legal partner for small law firms handling criminal and civil cases, streamlining research, discovery, and trial preparation so you can spend less time searching and more time winning.[file:2]

From intake to discovery, research to trial prep, Publius cuts days of work into hours by instantly surfacing relevant case law, documents, and digital evidence — hosted on your terms, either on-premise or in a SOC 2–ready secure cloud.[file:1][file:2]

## Core product

- [Home](https://publius.law): High-level overview of Publius as an AI-powered legal technology platform for small practices handling criminal and civil cases.[file:2]
- [Cloud-Based AI](https://publius.law/landing/solution.html): Scalable cloud deployment option for secure document review and legal research.[file:2]
- [On-Premise AI](https://publius.law/landing/solution.html): Full-control deployment on your own infrastructure for in-house legal analysis and maximum data control.[file:2]
- [Custom Development](https://publius.law/landing/solution.html): Tailored AI solutions built around your specific legal workflows and tools.[file:2]
- [Log in](https://publius.law/log-in.html): Access point for existing Publius users to sign in to the platform.[file:2]

## Use cases & benefits

- [Less grind. More law.](https://publius.law): Explanation of how Publius streamlines work from intake to discovery, research, and trial prep so attorneys can focus on clients.[file:2]
- [Built for small practices](https://publius.law): Details on Publius being designed exclusively for solo attorneys and small law firms that need enterprise-grade AI without enterprise pricing.[file:1][file:2]
- [Security & hosting](https://publius.law): Highlights of bank-level encryption, strict confidentiality controls, and the option to choose between a private server or secure cloud.[file:1][file:2]

## Company & contact

- [About](https://publius.law/company/about.html): Background on Publius Labs, its mission, and why it focuses on small law firms and solo practitioners.[file:2]
- [Contact](https://publius.law/company/contact.html): Contact information and form for inquiries from attorneys, firms, and partners.[file:2]
- [Request Demo](https://publius.law/features/request-demo.html): Page for attorneys and firms to request a product demo or early access.[file:2]
- [Email](mailto:info@publius.law): Direct email channel for questions about Publius, deployment options, and early access.[file:1][file:2]
- [Phone](tel:13479787887): Phone number for contacting the Publius team.[file:1][file:2]
- [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/publiuslegal/): Social profile describing Publius’ positioning and updates.[file:2]
- [X (Twitter)](https://x.com/PubliusNews): Updates and announcements related to Publius and legal AI.[file:2]

## Safety, ethics & responsibility

- [Professional Judgment & Ethics Notice](https://publius.law): Disclosure that Publius is a legal technology platform, not a law firm; it does not provide legal advice, does not create an attorney–client relationship, and users remain responsible for their legal work and ethical obligations under applicable laws and professional rules.[file:1][file:2]
